channel.title: The Weinstein Co. on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in The Weinstein Co. on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Harvey Weinstein Drops Suit Against Brother Bob
item.description: Harvey Weinstein has dropped a lawsuit against his brother Bob, in which he accused his sibling of “financial betrayal” that led to the collapse of his company. Harvey Weinstein is in jail
